{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.12174v1", "title": "Independence of the conjugacy problem and conjugacy separability", "summary": "We construct a class of finitely generated groups which have arbitrarily
large conjugacy separability function, but in which the conjugacy problem can
be solved in polynomial time, demonstrating that the McKinsey algorithm for the
conjugacy problem can have complexity which lies arbitrarily far from the
optimum.", "main_category": "math.GR", "categories": "math.GR", "published": "2025-04-16T15:25:50Z"}
